name: portal
description: Site institucional PWA da **Igreja Presbiteriana Vida** em Campinas-SP.

scripts.build:clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.build:copy: shx cp -r assets dist/assets && shx cp -r css dist/css && shx cp -r pagina dist/pagina && shx cp index.html dist/index.html && shx cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && shx cp browserconfig.xml dist/browserconfig.xml && shx cp -r data dist/data && shx mkdir -p dist/js && shx cp js/*.js dist/js/ && shx rm -f dist/js/env-dev.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages
